definitions.text: a painful sore with a hard core filled with pus
the temperature at which a liquid boils at sea level
examples: they brought the water to a boil

definitions.text: come to the boiling point and change from a liquid to vapor
immerse or be immersed in a boiling liquid, often for cooking purposes
bring to, or maintain at, the boiling point
examples: boil this liquid until it evaporates
the sea was churning in the storm

definitions.text: be in an agitated emotional state
examples: The customer was seething with anger
